offences.offenceTitle: Theft from a shop - Item 1 of 3
offences.offenceSummary: On 01/01/2015 at own, stole article, to the value of £987.00, belonging to person.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.

offences.offenceTitle: Theft from a different shop - Item 2 of 3
offences.offenceSummary: On 02/01/2015 at own, stole article, to the value of £123.00, belonging to person.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.

offences.offenceTitle: Theft from a different shop - Item 3 of 3
offences.offenceSummary: On 02/01/2015 at own, stole article, to the value of £123.00, belonging to person.
offences.act: Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.
